value:
$WmMPID_ニュクス,ch05_57_Nyx_F_Normal,Face|I took countless lives in my foolish
youth. For that, I was cursed with
this unaging body...$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_MNS_FE12_04,0|$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Finally! We made it! Now, to get
that gate open.$k$p$EFace_Pain|Hmmm-MMPH—$k$pHuh...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|This is no time for playing
around, Sharena.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I'm not playing around! The gate
won't budge!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|But there's no lock... Strange.$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face|Oh no! That's right... I'm sorry...
This gate can only be opened by
those from Niðavellir's royal line.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|So we have no way to get past
the gate?$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I'm afraid not... I wish I knew of any
other way to open it...$k$pIf we can't get past it, we'll be
unable to investigate whatever
it is my brothers are up to...$k$p$SspSE_SUMMON_STONE_FLASH|$Fo200,255,255,255,255|$Fi300|$w0|$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|H-huh?! ...I-it just opened!$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Yes! This is amazing... The kings
of ages past must be watching
over us!$k$pThank you, Your Majesties!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|Convenient... That certainly saves
us some trouble! Let's hurry through
before the kings change their minds.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Right! Let's get going! Er...what's
wrong, $Nu?$k$pWhat's that you found? Oh!
That looks like...$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch00_35_Eitri_F_Normal,Face_Anger|The gate...is open.$k$p$EFace_Smile|Heh... Heh heh heh...
AH-HAHAHAHAAAHH!$k$p$EFace_Cool|So this is how things are, is it?!
How dare you, Ótr...$k$pThe divine dragon has not abandoned
Niðavellir yet. You will not be allowed
to simply do whatever you please...$k$p$Sbs150|
